Here's an idea - have a texture switcher for the plain Aerodynamic Nose Cone that cycles through the stock blue dot, a black dot, all black, and all white?  For instance.  The blue dot however, matches nothing else in the game.

> 20 minutes ago, KerBlitz Kerman said:
> 
> 
> Ah. Just the parachutes (1.25 caps) are ugly, Can you just remove the the red/blue spots but have the name on it?
> 

Oh! I could totally do that yeah - I might even make it the default value too. Nice thing with FSTextureSwitch2 is that not only can you define textures to swap between, but you can define which one is the default texture when you drag it out. Plus it saves which textures you pick per craft ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

Just released version 0.15 with [@cy4n](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/160682-cy4n/)'s fixed decoupler texture (I also doubled the resolution), added gray and white variants to the standard nosecone, and added plain variants of the end-cap parachutes. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

The "Swept Wing", "AV-R8", and "Tail Fin".

And just out of curiosity, I don't suppose you have anything for the AV-T1 do you? If not, I think [@Ven](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/109931-ven/) has a replacement texture in his Stock Overhaul mod, though it might be an entirely new model.

Can we get an editor button which temporarily reverts all textures to stock.

Alao can you remove the lines on the mk 2&3 <abbr title="Liquid Fuel and Oxidizer">LFO</abbr>, MP, and <abbr title="Liquid Fuel">LF</abbr> fuselages as well as white rockomax tanks, white bi,tri, and quadcouplers.

Thx! 

P.S. MP=Monopropellant.

This mod uses the FireSpitter plugin to get the texture switching so I sadly can't add any features to it, to revert all the textures to stock you'll need to remove the mod from GameData ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")

When you say lines on the white rockomax tanks you mean the SLS/Apollo tanks right? I'm actually a big fan of them so I don't think I'll remove them. It actually takes a fair deal of effort to get textures that look good.
